definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: follow at the heel, fig. assail insidiously, circumvent, overreach (denom. from [[עָקֵב]]; cf. Ar. 9aqaba follow (at the heel), succeed, III. bring consequence on, i.e. punish, Qor 22:59, IV. make to follow, i.e.  reward  or punish, 9a0qibah;un end, final lot 6:11 reward 6:136 9qab  hold back (rare), follow, Pa. investigate, search out: Eth. 9aqba: is keep, guard);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. Ho 12:4 [[בַּבֶּטֶן עָקַב אֶת־אָחִיו]] he attacked his brother at the heel (cf. Ge 25:26 sub [[עָקֵב]]); Impf. 3 ms. Ge 27:36 [[הֲכִי קָרָא שְׁמוֹ יַעֲקׂב וַיַּעְקְבֵנִי]] [[זֶה פַעֲמַיִם]] and he hath overreached me now twice; + Inf. abs Je 9:3 [[בָּל־אָח עָקוֹב יַעֲקׂב]] surely overreacheth (‖[[רָכִיל יַהֲלֽח]]). [LXX pterni/zw, to attack with the heel; but this dub. In ‘supplant,&rs. also, the fig. is a different one.]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Job 37:4 [[וְלאׁ יְעַקְּבֵם]] dub.; poss attack at the heel (cf. [[זִנֵּב]]), hence fig. hold back; more prob. rd. [[וְלאׁ]] [[יְעַכְּבֵם]] holdeth them not back (sc. [[בְּרָקָיו]] his lightnings), when his voice is heard from [[עִכֵּב]] to hold back (common in NH; Targum [[עַכֵּב]]).
